<a id="VisualShaderNodeVectorDecompose"></a>

# VisualShaderNodeVectorDecompose

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNodeVectorBase](VisualShaderNodeVectorBase.md) **\<** [VisualShaderNode](VisualShaderNode.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Decomposes a [Vector2](Vector2.md), [Vector3](Vector3.md) or 4D vector (represented as a [Quaternion](Quaternion.md)) into scalars within the visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Takes a ``vec2``, ``vec3`` or ``vec4`` and decomposes it into scalar values that can be used as separate outputs.
